dict.acceptation: 消费；肺病；耗尽；[医学]消耗性疾病；

sent.orig: On campus, high consumption coexists with low consumption, together with precocious consumption and immature consumption.
sent.trans: 在大学校园，高消费者和低消费者同在，早熟型消费与不成熟型消费共存。

sent.orig: Consumption of aesthetic values into realistic consumption and artistic consumption, the latter being pure aesthetic consumption.
sent.trans: 审美价值的消费分为现实中审美价值的消费与艺术中审美价值的消费，后者是单纯的审美消费。

sent.orig: Social transformation period; Harmonious consumption concept; Green consumption; Civilized consumption; Rational consumption.
sent.trans: 社会转型期；和谐消费观；绿色消费；文明消费；理性消费。

sent.orig: Carbon anode consumption comprises electrical consumption, extra consumption (excess consumption) .
sent.trans: 炭阳极消耗包括电解消耗、额外消耗（过剩消耗）及残极。

sent.orig: The final consumption expenditure is broken down into household consumption expenditure and government consumption expenditure.
sent.trans: 最终消费支出分为居民消费支出和政府消费支出。
